verses.verse: "How have you helped <S%H5826><s%> him who is without power! <S%H3581><s%> How have you saved <S%H3467><s%> the arm <S%H2220><s%> that has no <S%H3808><s%> strength! <S%H5797><s%>
How have you counseled him who has no <S%H3808><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and plentifully <S%H7230><s%> declared <S%H3045><s%> sound knowledge! <S%H8454><s%>
To whom have you uttered <S%H5046><s%> words? <S%H4405><s%> Whose spirit <S%H5397><s%> came forth from you? <S%H3318><s%>
"Those who are deceased <S%H7496><s%> tremble, <S%H2342><s%> those beneath the waters <S%H4325><s%> and all that live in them. <S%H7931><s%>
Sheol <S%H7585><s%> is naked <S%H6174><s%> before God, <S%H11><s%> and Abaddon has no covering. <S%H3682><s%>
He stretches out <S%H5186><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%> over empty space, <S%H8414><s%> and hangs <S%H8518><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> on nothing. <S%H1099><s%>
He binds up <S%H6887><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> in his thick clouds, <S%H5645><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> is not burst under them. <S%H1234><s%>
He encloses <S%H270><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of his throne, <S%H3678><s%> and spreads <S%H6576><s%> his cloud on it. <S%H6051><s%>
He has described <S%H2328><s%> a boundary <S%H2706><s%> on the surface of the waters, <S%H6440><s%> and to the confines <S%H8503><s%> of light <S%H216><s%> and darkness. <S%H2822><s%>
The pillars <S%H5982><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> tremble <S%H7322><s%> and are astonished <S%H8539><s%> at his rebuke. <S%H1606><s%>
He stirs <S%H7280><s%> up the sea <S%H3220><s%> with his power, <S%H3581><s%> and by his understanding <S%H8394><s%> he strikes <S%H4272><s%> through Rahab. <S%H7293><s%>
By his Spirit <S%H7307><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are garnished. <S%H8235><s%> His hand <S%H3027><s%> has pierced <S%H2342><s%> the swift <S%H1281><s%> serpent. <S%H5175><s%>

Behold, <S%H7098><s%> these are but the outskirts of his ways. <S%H1870><s%> How small <S%H8102><s%> a whisper <S%H1697><s%> do we hear <S%H8085><s%> of him! <S%H7482><s%> But the thunder of his power <S%H1369><s%> who can understand? <S%H995><s%>"
